title: After the passage of the Genius Act, “smart cloud mining” attracts investors to lay out their plans in advance, and InvroMining platform growth speeds up again.
description: As the U.S. Congress continues to advance crypto legislation such as the Genius Act, the market’s expectations for regulatory “clarity” continue to rise. Bitcoin has recently surpassed $120,000, and the entire cryptocurrency ecosystem is showing signs of a policy-driven “structural bull market”. Under this policy wind, more and more investors have shifted their attention from […]The post After the passage of the Genius Act, “smart cloud mining” attracts investors to lay out their plans in advance, and InvroMining platform growth speeds up again...

title: Crypto market hits record high after Trump order
description: Bitcoin price teases all-time high as altcoins surge following ‘breakthrough’ moment for cryptocurrency
